column6: Enter The Red Skull! Reeling over his near-fatal encounter with the Skull, Captain America takes matters into his own hands in pursuit of his terrifying new adversary and his terrorist employers!
column8: | other:Chris Eliopoulos | colorist:Laura Martin | colorist:Justin Ponsor | inker:Danny K. Miki | writer:Mark Millar | penciller:Carlos Pacheco | letterer:Cory Petit
